implicit none

integer :: n, x, prime, bills

integer, allocatable :: a(:)

integer :: f, k, i, j, t, k_found, i_found, j_found

! Second part:

   prime = prime +1

end if

   integer :: sqrt_num, i

   sqrt_num = int(sqrt(real(prime)))

   logical :: is_prime = .true.

      if (mod(prime, i) ==0) then

integer, allocatable :: digits(:)

digits =0

do i=0, L-1

   integer :: charIndex = L -i

      end if

      bills = bills +5

   else

      digits(i+1) = digits(i+1) +1

      bills = bills + (10 - digits(i))

   end if

end do

! Output the result

print*, bills

end program
